title: Photo Editing Web App

requirements.text: Build a photo editing application where users can upload a photo from their device and see it displayed in a central canvas/preview area.

quotes: Photo edit apk high quality apk create

acceptanceCriteria: User can click an upload button to select an image from their device
Selected image is displayed in a prominent preview canvas
Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP

requirements.text: Implement core photo transformation tools: crop (with draggable handles), rotate (90° clockwise/counter-clockwise), and flip (horizontal/vertical).

quotes: Photo edit apk high quality apk create

acceptanceCriteria: Crop tool renders a resizable selection box over the image
Rotate buttons rotate the image by 90° increments
Flip buttons mirror the image horizontally and vertically
All transformations update the canvas preview in real-time

requirements.text: Implement a set of one-click photo filters/effects (e.g., Vivid, B&W, Sepia, Warm, Cool, Fade, Sharpen) that are applied via CSS/Canvas filters to the preview image.

quotes: Photo edit apk high quality apk create

acceptanceCriteria: At least 7 filter presets are displayed as thumbnail previews below the canvas
Clicking a filter applies it instantly to the main canvas preview
Active filter is visually highlighted
A 'None' / original option is available to reset filters

requirements.text: Add adjustment sliders for brightness, contrast, saturation, and sharpness that modify the image in real-time as the user drags each slider.

quotes: Photo edit apk high quality apk create

acceptanceCriteria: Four labeled sliders are displayed in an adjustments panel
Each slider ranges from -100 to +100 with 0 as the default center
Canvas preview updates live as sliders are moved
A 'Reset Adjustments' button resets all sliders to 0

requirements.text: Implement a high-quality image export feature that renders all applied edits (transformations, filters, adjustments) onto a Canvas element and downloads the result as a PNG file at the original image resolution.
acceptanceCriteria: A clearly labeled 'Download' or 'Export' button is present
Clicking it triggers a browser download of the edited image as a PNG
Exported image resolution matches the original uploaded image dimensions
All active filters, adjustments, and transformations are baked into the exported file

requirements.text: Design a sleek, dark-mode photo editor UI with a deep charcoal/slate color palette, crisp white typography, and vibrant accent highlights. Layout should follow a professional editor pattern: top toolbar, central canvas, left/right side panels for tools and adjustments, and a bottom filter strip.
acceptanceCriteria: App uses a dark background (e.g., #1a1a2e or similar dark charcoal)
Tool icons and labels are clearly legible in white/light grey
Active tools and selected filters use a vivid accent color (e.g., teal or amber)
Layout has distinct zones: toolbar, canvas, tools panel, adjustments panel, and filter strip
The overall aesthetic feels professional and modern, comparable to a mobile photo editor

constraints: All image processing must happen client-side in the browser using Canvas API and CSS filters — no image data should be sent to the backend
Do not use any external image processing libraries that require server-side execution
Backend should remain minimal; no image storage in the canister
nonGoals: Native Android APK packaging — this is a web application
Cloud storage or saving edits to a backend database

required: Dark-themed photo editor app logo mark — abstract camera aperture or lens icon with teal and amber gradient accents on a dark background (pixelcraft-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Placeholder/sample photo for the editor canvas default state — a vibrant landscape photo with rich colors (sample-photo.dim_1200x800.png)
